report.title: Locations list
report.description: A general purpose list of locations.
report.query: SELECT #field_sql# FROM locations l LEFT JOIN locations_websites lw on lw.location_id=l.id AND lw.deleted=false LEFT JOIN (termlists_terms ttl1 JOIN terms tinput ON tinput.id=ttl1.term_id JOIN termlists_terms ttl2 ON ttl2.meaning_id=ttl1.meaning_id JOIN terms t ON t.id=ttl2.term_id ) ON ttl1.id=l.location_type_id #joins# WHERE l.deleted=false AND #website_filter# AND (CAST(l.location_type_id AS character varying)='#location_type_id#' OR '#location_type_id#'='' OR t.term='#location_type_id#') #order_by#
report.field_sql: l.id as location_id, l.name, l.location_type_id, tinput.term as location_type, l.centroid_sref, l.centroid_sref_system

param.name: location_type_id
param.description: Select the location type, or leave blank to not filter by location type.

param.name: locattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of location attribute IDs to include
